"Take Us To The Sea!":
"This is a request from all three of us.
Since we're all in swimsuits, we want
to go to the sea to make memories.
Please take us to the sea.

※Clear on Normal or higher, accompanied
by Hitsugi (Summer), Harriet (Summer)
and Matoi (Summer)"

"Matoi (Summer)'s PC\u3000※Given on acceptance
